name.vi: Giấy phép Công cộng Mozilla, phiên bản 1.1
name.ja: Mozilla Public License バージョン 1.1
name.zh-CN: Mozilla 公共许可协议，版本 1.1

release_notes.en-US: This version is only compatible with Thunderbird 5 and above.   For Thunderbird 3.1 or below, or for Sunbird, you should use vcs Support 0.6.3.

description.fr: Pour être utilisée avec Thunderbird, ceci nécessite d'avoir installé l'extension de calendrier se nommant Lightning, qui est disponible sur la page https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313
description.de: Zur Nutzung in Thunderbird wird die Lightning-Erweiterung benötigt, siehe: https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 Diese Erweiterung fügt in Sunbird und Thunderbird mit Lightning Unterstützung für das vCalendar-Format (*.vcs) in die Import- und Exportdialoge hinzu. Damit erstellte Kalender lassen sich von vielen Mobilgeräten wie z.B. einigen Handys lesen.
description.nl: Voor gebruik met Thunderbird vereist deze extensie de installatie van de Lightning kalenderextensie, die beschikbaar is op https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 Deze extensie voegt "vCalendar (*.vcs)" aan het import- en exportdialoogvenster van Thunderbird met Lightning en Sunbird toe, waardoor een geselecteerde kalender naar een bestand in de vCalendar-opmaak wordt geëxporteerd, dat geschikt is om gelezen te worden door veel mobiele apparatuur.
description.pt-PT: Para usar com o Thunderbird, esta extensão necessita que instalem a extensão Lightning calendar disponível em: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/2313 Esta extensão adiciona"vCalendar (*.vcs)"ao diálogo de importação e exportação do Thunderbird com Lightning e Sunbird que exporta o calendário seleccionado para um ficheiro no formato vCalendar, adequado para leitura em diversos dispositivos móveis.
description.zh-TW: 在 Thunderbird 中使用，此扩展需要安装 Lightning 日历扩展，位于：https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 此扩展在安装了 Lightning 的 Thunderbird 的导入导出对话框中添加 "vCalendar (*.vcs)"。并且 Sunbird 也可以导出选择的日历为 vCalendar 格式的文件。vCalendar 格式的文件可适合于被许多移动设备读取。
description.en-US: For use with Thunderbird, this extension requires the installation of the Lightning calendar extension, available from: here. This extension adds "vCalendar (*.vcs)" to the import and export dialogs of Thunderbird with Lightning and Sunbird which will export a selected calendar to a file in the vCalendar format, suitable for reading by many mobile devices. This version is only compatible with Thunderbird 5 and above. For Thunderbird 3.1 or below, or for Sunbird, you should use vcs Support 0.6.3.1 available from here.
description.ko: Thunderbird에서 사용하려면, 이 확장기능은 https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 에 존재하는 Lightning calendar확장기능의 설치를 필요로 합니다. 이 확장기능은 선택한 달력을 많은 휴대용 장치에서 읽기 적당한 vCalendar 형식으로 파일을 내보낼 Sunbird와 Lightning을 가진 Thunderbird에 "vCalendar (*.vcs)"으로 불러오기와 내보내기 대화상자를 추가합니다.
description.it: Se si vuole usare questa estensione con Thunderbird, occorre installare anche l'estensione Lightning, disponibile su: https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 Questa estensione aggiunge la voce "Esporta come .vcs" al menu Calendario di Thunderbird + Lightning, o al menu File di Sunbird. Questa voce esporta il calendario selezionato in un file in formato vCalendar, in grado di essere letto da molto dispositivi mobili.
description.sk: Pre použitie s Thunderbird toto rozšírenie vyžaduje inštaláciu Lightning rozšírení kalendára, dostupný z: https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 Toto rozšírene pridáva "vCalendar (*.vcs)" do import a export dialógov Thunderbird s Lightning a Sunbird ,ktoré bude exportovať vybraný kalendár do súboru vo vCalendar formáte, vhodnom na čítanie mnohými mobilnými zariadeniami.
description.pt-BR: Para usar com Thunderbird, é necessário instalar a extensão de calendário Lightning, disponível em: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/2313 Esta extensão adiciona "vCalendar (*.vcs)" para os diálogos de importação e exportação do Thunderbird com Lightning e Sunbird que exportará o calendário selecionado para um arquivo no formato vCalendar, adequada para leitura em diversos dispositivos móveis.
description.fi: Thunderbirdin kanssa k�ytt�ess�, t�m� lis�osa vaatii Lightning calendar-lis�osan, jonka saa osoitteesta: https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 T�m� lis�osa antaa l�hett�� ja ladata "vCalendar (*.vcs)"-muotoisia Thunderbirdin dialogeja Lightningin ja Sunbirdin kanssa joka l�hett�� valitut kalenterit tiedostoon vCalendar muodossa, joka sopii lukemissen monilla kanettavilla laiteilla.
description.ja: この拡張機能を Thunderbird で使用するには、Lightning カレンダー拡張をインストールする必要があります。Lightning は次の場所からインストールできます: https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 この拡張機能は "vCalendar (*.vcs)" を、Thunderbird 上の Lightning や Sunbird のインポートダイアログおよびエクスポートダイアログに追加します。これは選択したカレンダーを、多くのモバイル機器で読み込める vCalendar 形式のファイルにエクスポートします。
description.he: לשימוש בתוכנת Thunderbird, הרחבה זו דורשת את ההתקנה של הרחבת לוח השנה "Lightning" הניתנת להורדה בכתובת https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/2313 הרחבה זו מוסיפה "vCalendar (*.vcs)" לתיבות הדו-שיח של Thunderbird עם Lightning ו-Sunbird, אשר יגרום ליצוא או יבוא של הלוח הנבחר לקובץ בתצורת vCalendar המתאים לקריאה במכשירים ניידים רבים.
